verses.verse: For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G5484><s%> I Paul, <S%G3972><s%> the prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> for you Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%>
If <S%G1489><s%> you have heard <S%G191><s%> of the dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> me to you-ward: <S%G1519><s%>
How that by revelation <S%G602><s%> he made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to me the mystery; <S%G3466><s%> (as I wrote <S%G4270><s%> before <S%G4270><s%> in few <S%G3641><s%> words,
Whereby <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3739><s%> when you read, <S%G314><s%> you may <S%G1410><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> my knowledge <S%G4907><s%> in the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of Christ) <S%G5547><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> in other <S%G2087><s%> ages <S%G1074><s%> was not made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to the sons <S%G5207><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> as it is now <S%G3568><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> to his holy <S%G40><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> and prophets <S%G4396><s%> by the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

That the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> should be fellow heirs, <S%G4789><s%> and of the same <S%G4954><s%> body, <S%G4954><s%> and partakers <S%G4830><s%> of his promise <S%G1860><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> by the gospel: <S%G2098><s%>

Whereof <S%G3739><s%> I was made <S%G1096><s%> a minister, <S%G1249><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the gift <S%G1431><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to me by the effectual <S%G1753><s%> working <S%G1753><s%> of his power. <S%G1411><s%>

To me, who am less <S%G1647><s%> than the least <S%G1647><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> given, <S%G1325><s%> that I should preach <S%G2097><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> the unsearchable <S%G421><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

And to make <S%G5461><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men see <S%G5461><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of the mystery, <S%G3466><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> from the beginning of the world <S%G165><s%> has been hid <S%G614><s%> in God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

To the intent <S%G2443><s%> that now <S%G3568><s%> to the principalities <S%G746><s%> and powers <S%G1849><s%> in heavenly <S%G2032><s%> places might be known <S%G1107><s%> by the church <S%G1577><s%> the manifold <S%G4182><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>
According <S%G2596><s%> to the eternal <S%G165><s%> purpose <S%G4286><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he purposed <S%G4160><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Lord: <S%G2962><s%>
In whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> and access <S%G4318><s%> with confidence <S%G4006><s%> by the faith <S%G4102><s%> of him.
Why <S%G1352><s%> I desire <S%G154><s%> that you faint <S%G1573><s%> not at <S%G1722><s%> my tribulations <S%G2347><s%> for you, which <S%G3748><s%> is your glory. <S%G1391><s%>
For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G5484><s%> I bow <S%G2578><s%> my knees <S%G1119><s%> to the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>
Of whom <S%G3739><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> family <S%G3965><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth <S%G1093><s%> is named, <S%G3687><s%>

That he would grant <S%G1325><s%> you, according <S%G2596><s%> to the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his glory, <S%G1391><s%> to be strengthened <S%G2901><s%> with might <S%G1411><s%> by his Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in the inner <S%G2080><s%> man; <S%G444><s%>

That Christ <S%G5547><s%> may dwell <S%G2730><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> by faith; <S%G4102><s%> that you, being rooted <S%G4492><s%> and grounded <S%G2311><s%> in love, <S%G26><s%>

May be able <S%G1840><s%> to comprehend <S%G2638><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the breadth, <S%G4114><s%> and length, <S%G3372><s%> and depth, <S%G899><s%> and height; <S%G5311><s%>

And to know <S%G1097><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which passes <S%G5235><s%> knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> that you might be filled <S%G4137><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> the fullness <S%G4138><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that is able <S%G1410><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> exceeding <S%G5228><s%> abundantly <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that we ask <S%G154><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> think, <S%G3539><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the power <S%G1411><s%> that works <S%G1754><s%> in us,

To him be glory <S%G1391><s%> in the church <S%G1577><s%> by Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ages, <S%G1074><s%> world <S%G165><s%> without end. <S%G165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
